text: The time units for specifying animation parameters.
The timing parameters below will be specified in seconds.
The timing parameters below will be specified in frames.
The time (in seconds) to import the animated pose from.

animation starts, earlier poses will be
    clamped to this value. When disabled, this value is taken from the source
    animation where available. If it has no range information, Houdini’s scene
    start (
Note that no clamping is done when this is disabled.

Note that no clamping is done when this is disabled.

The destination time at which the specified animation will begin to
    playback. When disabled, Houdini’s scene start (
The number to import the animated pose from.

animation starts, earlier poses will be

Note that no clamping is done when this is disabled.

Note that no clamping is done when this is disabled.

The destination frame at which the specified animation will begin to
    playback. When disabled, Houdini’s scene start (

Sets the speed factor for the playback of the animation. This is
    applied after any clamping is performed from the Animation Start/End
    parameters.
